title: When You Don't Have the Talk
itunes:summary:
Physical intimacy is a very significant part of your marriage. Yet, it's a topic that many couples are uncomfortable discussing. John, Erin and Greg explain how you can show your spouse grace, when a sexual problem is happening in the marriage. Featuring Mr. Gary Thomas and Mrs. Debra Fileta.


Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.


Receive the book "Married Sex" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-10-06?refcd=1492001


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/when-you-dont-have-the-talk/#featured-resource-cta


Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/improving-your-sex-life-to-improve-your-marriage-digital-download/?refcd=1492001


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
